description: A research-based thesis course that offers students the opportunity to work on a comprehensive, individual project that demonstrates mastery of computer science. Topic to be agreed in consultation with a supervisor. The project will be of suitable complexity for results to be published for an expert audience. Students commencing in semester 1 enrol in COMP7881, students commencing in semester 2 enrol in COMP7882. Students wishing to complete thesis in a single semester enrol in COMP7880.
